Title: MvcXaml
Description: A custom View Engine for ASP.NET MVC that allows Controller Action Methods to return dynamically generated images based on XAML markup.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A custom View Engine for ASP.NET MVC that allows Controller Action Methods to return dynamically generated images based on XAML markup.

Articles

MvcXaml - Images from XAML within ASP.NET MVC Application by Chris Pietschmann
MvcXaml v1.0 is Available as a NuGet Package


Contributors
